今日話すこと

  • AWS CDK とは？
  • AWS CDK の書き方
  • サンプル

はじめます

AWS CDK とは？

TL;DR

TS を書くと AWS 環境が出来上がる

TS で書ける CFn(Cloud Formation) て感じ

CFn は(あの使いにくい)AWS コンソールをそのままいじっている感じ

CDK はより直感的

TS の型に導かれる

AWS CDK の書き方

最小ファイル構成

package.json

 1. {
 2.   "name": "cdk-sample",
 3.   "version": "1.0.0",
 4.   "main": "index.js",
 5.   "license": "MIT",
 6.   "scripts": {
 7.     "cdk": "cdk",
 8.     "synth": "cdk synth",
 9.     "deploy": "cdk deploy"
10.   },
11.   "devDependencies": {
12.     "@types/node": "^10.9.4",
13.     "aws-cdk": "^0.30.0",
14.     "ts-node": "^8.1.0",
15.     "typescript": "^3.2.4"
16.   },
17.   "dependencies": {
18.     "@aws-cdk/aws-s3": "*",
19.     "@aws-cdk/cdk": "*"
20.   }
21. }
22.

cdk.json

 1. { "app": "ts-node index.ts" }

index.ts

 1. import cdk = require("@aws-cdk/cdk");
 2. import s3 = require("@aws-cdk/aws-s3");
 3. 
 4. class MyStack extends cdk.Stack {
 5.   constructor(parent: cdk.App, name: string) {
 6.     super(parent, name);
 7. 
 8.     new s3.Bucket(this, "MyBucket", {
 9.       bucketName: "bucket-tte-baketsu-no-koto-nandane"
10.     });
11.   }
12. }
13. 
14. const app = new cdk.App();
15. 
16. new MyStack(app, "CdkAample");
17.

cdk synth

cdk deploy

s3 bucket できた

やったね！

サンプル

Static Site

 1. import cdk = require('@aws-cdk/cdk')
 2. import cloudfront = require('@aws-cdk/aws-cloudfront')
 3. import s3 = require('@aws-cdk/aws-s3')
 4. import s3deploy = require('@aws-cdk/aws-s3-deployment')
 5. 
 6. class MyStack extends cdk.Stack {
 7.   constructor(parent: cdk.App, name: string) {
 8.     super(parent, name)
 9. 
10.     const siteBucket = new s3.Bucket(this, 'MyBucket', {
11.       bucketName: 'bucket-tte-baketsu-no-koto-nandane',
12.       websiteIndexDocument: 'index.html',
13.       publicReadAccess: true,
14.     })
15. 
16.     new s3deploy.BucketDeployment(this, 'MySiteDeployment', {
17.       source: s3deploy.Source.asset('./dist'),
18.       destinationBucket: siteBucket,
19.     })
20. 
21.     const distribution = new cloudfront.CloudFrontWebDistribution(
22.       this,
23.       'MyWebDistribution',
24.       {
25.         originConfigs: [
26.           {
27.             s3OriginSource: { s3BucketSource: siteBucket },
28.             behaviors: [{ isDefaultBehavior: true }],
29.           },
30.         ],
31.       },
32.     )
33. 
34.     new cdk.CfnOutput(this, 'DistributionId', {
35.       value: distribution.distributionId,
36.     })
37.     new cdk.CfnOutput(this, 'DomainName', {
38.       value: distribution.domainName,
39.     })
40.   }
41. }
42. 
43. const app = new cdk.App()
44. 
45. new MyStack(app, 'CdkAample')
46.
できたページ
  • CureApp
  • アプリで医療機器を作ってる
  • TS, react, RN, Node.js, MongoDB

おわり。

ご清聴ありがとうございました！！
